content.text: On a mountain, the temperature decreases by \(6.5^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\) for every 1000 metres increase in height. At 2000 metres the temperature is \(10^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\)
Use your calculator to find the value of
How many planes of symmetry does this cuboid have?
Write down the order of rotational symmetry for the following diagram
Write down all your working to show that the following statement is correct
\(A, B, C\) and \(D\) lie on a circle centre \(O\). Angle \(ADC = 108^\circ\)
The train fare from Bangkok to Chiang Mai is 768 baht
Calculate the train fare in pounds (£)
Acri invested \$500 for 3 years at a rate of \(2.8\%\) per year compound interest
Calculate the final amount he has after 3 years
A large water bottle holds 25 litres of water correct to the nearest litre
A drinking glass holds 0.3 litres correct to the nearest 0.1 litre
Calculate the lower bound for the number of glasses of water which can be filled from the bottle
The electrical resistance, \(R\) , of a length of cylindrical wire varies inversely as the square of the diameter, \(d\) , of the wire
The diagram shows a circular disc with radius \(6\mathrm{cm}\)
In the centre of the disc there is a circular hole with radius \(0.5\mathrm{cm}\)
Calculate the area of the shaded section
Find the matrix which represents the combined transformation of a reflection in the \(x\) axis
by a reflection in the line \(y = x\)
ABC is a sector of a circle, radius 4 cm and centre C
The length of the arc \(AB\) is \(8 \text{cm}\) and angle \(ACB = x^\circ\)
The diagram shows the speed-time graph of a bus journey between two bus stops
Hamid runs at a constant speed of \(4\mathrm{m / s}\) along the bus route
He passes the bus as it leaves the first bus stop
The bus arrives at the second bus stop after 60 seconds
How many metres from the bus is Hamid at this time?
Rearrange the formula \(y = \frac{x + 2}{x - 4}\) to make \(x\) the subject
the locus of points which are equidistant from \(A\) and from \(B\),
the locus of points which are \(4\mathrm{cm}\) from \(C\)
Using a straight edge and compasses only, construct
Shade the region in the diagram which is
AB is the diameter of a circle
C is a point on \(AB\) such that \(AC = 4 \text{cm}\)
Find the probability that an egg chosen at random is graded very large
the number of eggs with a mass greater than 65 grams
The cumulative frequency diagram shows the results from the table
Use the cumulative frequency diagram to find
Lauris records the mass and grade of 300 eggs. The table shows the results

(\(x\) grams)		\(30 < x \leqslant 40\)\(40 < x \leqslant 50\)\(50 < x \leqslant 60\)\(60 < x \leqslant 70\)\(70 < x \leqslant 80\)\(80 < x \leqslant\)

content.text: Write down the value of \(x\) when \(\mathrm{f}^{-1}(x) = 2\)
Find \(\mathrm{fg}(x)\). Give your answer in its simplest form
Reflect your triangle \(P'Q'R'\) in the line \(y = - x\)
Describe fully the single transformation which maps triangle \(PQR\) onto triangle \(P''Q''R''\)
